scripts.dev: run-s deps typecheck format test build
scripts.version: npm run build && npm run build:addins && node scripts/ensure-vendor && node scripts/create-packages
scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf dist && rimraf addins/build

json-comments.tips: You may install the JsonComments plugin to enable commenting functionality for JSON files, see: https://github.com/zhangfisher/json_comments_extension

package.json.scripts.format: Formats all .ts and .js files using Prettier
package.json.scripts.test: Runs Jest tests in a single thread
package.json.scripts.typecheck: Runs the TypeScript compiler to check for type errors
package.json.scripts.test:e2e: Runs end-to-end tests using a specific Jest configuration
package.json.scripts.build: Cleans the lib directory, builds the project using Rollup, and ensures vendor files are included
package.json.scripts.build:dev: Allows to quickly rebuild the project in development mode with environment variables set for easier debugging of the js/ts code
package.json.scripts.build:addins: Builds the add-ins by running a custom build script in the addins directory
package.json.scripts.build:bootstrap: Update the bootstrap file (used to build the addin) by using the latest addin build (inception!)
package.json.scripts.version: Prepares a new version by building the project, building add-ins, ensuring vendor files, and creating packages
package.json.scripts.postversion: Pushes commits and tags to the remote repository after versioning
package.json.scripts.release: Runs a custom release script to publish the new version
package.json.scripts.clean: Removes generated files from lib, dist, and addins/build directories
package.json.devDependencies.cross-env: Used to set environment variables in a cross-platform-compatible way for build scripts
